name: Jambo's Adventure
description:
﻿💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
John "Jumbo" Jameson, captain of the 1st Infantry Division

Brazil. 2045 "GRUK" and occupied the Amazon rainforests and are not going to retreat. GRUK and are well-trained fighters from the upper world who decided to take over the world and started from South America. According to the latest intelligence "GRUK" and have a nanosuit with the ability to fly, to be invisible. Captain "Jumbo" you need to destroy enemy forces and knock out forests, and only by combining forces we will be able to defeat them, so every three hours you have the opportunity to request from the community everything you need.

Kill them all and do not let them take over the world, captain!



Gameplay:
- Destroy in bundles of "GRUK" s
- Pump your gear
- Try to live the maximum number of waves "GRUK" s



Features:
- Shoot in different directions
- Try your luck and become frozen. Jumbo, which shoots freezing bullets.
- Be alert, because there are invisible enemies in the game.
- Pick up various assistive items to help you live more
- replayability
- Fascinating gameplay
- Good music
- Exciting bouts
- Beautiful pixel graphics
